name: About me
body:
**Hello**

I am **HuangYong**, a Quality Analyst from China.


I have published 2 handbooks on Github:

1. [Handbook of appium](http://hy1984427.github.io/appium/)

2. [Handbook of BDD with PageObject](http://hy1984427.github.io/BDD-with-PageObject/)


And I have also shared an article about Gamification in Insurance project on InfoQ China:
[Practice of gamification in insurance project](http://www.infoq.com/cn/articles/practice-of-gamification-in-insurance-project).


For more details about me, you can fine me on LinkedIn![(www.linkedin.com/in/hy1984427)](https://static.licdn.com/scds/common/u/img/webpromo/btn_viewmy_160x33.png).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
